original_solution_mapping.L1: There will be 18 members and she wants to allow 2 biscuits per member so that's 18*2 = <<18*2=36>>36 biscuits
original_solution_mapping.L2: Her biscuit recipe yields 9 biscuits and she needs to make 36 biscuits so she needs to make 36/9 = <<36/9=4>>4 batches of biscuits
original_solution_mapping.L3: 1 batch of biscuits uses 1 1/4 cup flour and she needs to make 4 batches so she will use 1.25*4 = <<1.25*4=5>>5 cups of flour

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4157.
    Returns: the total cups of flour Lady Bird will need.
    """
    # L1
    num_members = 18 # 18 members
    biscuits_per_guest = 2 # 2 biscuits per guest
    total_biscuits_needed = num_members * biscuits_per_guest

    # L2
    biscuits_per_batch = 9 # 9 biscuits
    num_batches = total_biscuits_needed / biscuits_per_batch

    # L3
    flour_per_batch = 1.25 # 1 1/4 cup flour
    total_flour_needed = flour_per_batch * num_batches

    # FA
    answer = total_flour_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There will be {num_members} members and she wants to allow {biscuits_per_guest} biscuits per member so that's {num_members}*{biscuits_per_guest} = <<{num_members}*{biscuits_per_guest}={total_biscuits_needed}>>{total_biscuits_needed} biscuits

Her biscuit recipe yields {biscuits_per_batch} biscuits and she needs to make {total_biscuits_needed} biscuits so she needs to make {total_biscuits_needed}/{biscuits_per_batch} = <<{total_biscuits_needed}/{biscuits_per_batch}={num_batches}>>{num_batches} batches of biscuits

1 batch of biscuits uses {flour_per_batch} cup flour and she needs to make {num_batches} batches so she will use {flour_per_batch}*{num_batches} = <<{flour_per_batch}*{num_batches}={total_flour_needed}>>{total_flour_needed} cups of flour

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: There will be 18 members and she wants to allow 2 biscuits per member so that's 18*2 = <<18*2=36>>36 biscuits
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Her biscuit recipe yields 9 biscuits and she needs to make 36 biscuits so she needs to make 36/9 = <<36/9=324>>324 batches of biscuits
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: 1 batch of biscuits uses 1.25 cup flour and she needs to make 324 batches so she will use 1.25*324 = <<1.25*324=405>>405 cups of flour

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.
